title: Use custom thumbnail image for the ₹199 product in demo seeded data

requirements.summary: Add a new custom 400x400 square product thumbnail image for the ₹199 product as a static generated asset.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png`.
The image is 400x400 and visually appropriate as a product thumbnail (no stretched aspect ratio, no tiny unreadable text).

file_operations.description: Add the generated 400x400 PNG thumbnail asset at this exact path and filename. Ensure it is a clean, readable, kid-friendly worksheets style illustration suitable for storefront product thumbnails.

requirements.summary: Update the Demo Data Seeder so the existing ₹199.00 product is assigned the new static image using ExternalBlob.fromURL in its images array.
acceptanceCriteria: After running the demo seeder on a fresh state, the ₹199.00 product appears in the Shop and Product Detail pages with the new custom image as its primary image.
The product image renders via `ExternalBlob.getDirectURL()` without errors, and no placeholder image is shown for the ₹199.00 product.

file_operations.description: Update the seeding flow to detect the already-existing product priced at INR ₹199.00 (19900 paise) and update it to use `images: [ExternalBlob.fromURL('/assets/generated/kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png')]`. Use the blob-storage component’s ExternalBlob capability (fromURL) for static asset-backed images. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
